CatDescriptText: Reverend C. H. Foggie was pastor of Wesley Center AMEZ church.  The poster on back wall reads "Free, Courtesy of Pepsi-Cola Company, Host and Pastor C. H. Foggie."
TitMainTitle: Women and men, including Mal Goode in foreground, drinking Pepsi-Cola during event sponsored by Rev. C. H. Foggie and Pepsi-Cola Company at Wesley Center AME Zion Church
